original_text: And out of the throne proceeded lightnings and thunderings and voices: and there were seven lamps of fire burning before the throne, which are the seven Spirits of God.
korean_text: 보좌로부터 번개와 음성과 우렛소리가 나고 보좌 앞에 켠 등불 일곱이 있으니 이는 하나님의 일곱 영이라

sentences.original_text: And out of the throne proceeded lightnings
and there were seven lamps of fire
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 일곱 개의 불빛 등대가 있었습니다

sentences.original_text: which are the seven Spirits of God.
